basic_information.scholarship_name: Nollert Family Scholarship in German Studies

description: This scholarship provides funds to support a student who is a German major or minor with a high academic record. This award is sponsored by alumnus Ben Odom to acknowledge the educational contributions of the Nollert family to Oklahoma. Eligibility Requirements Declared major or minor in German Minimum 3.5 GPA Active in German club/German-speaking community Continuing to study German at UCO Continuing student for fall semester that the scholarship is awarded

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship

criteria.description: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
criteria.raw_text: Complete Application: "UCO Foundation Qualifying Scholarship Application"
